question.content:
**Multiply.**  
*Hint: Use the array below to help solve the equation.*

$8 \times 4 = $ [[☃ numeric-input 2]]

![A cartoon image of a rectangular array with 8 rows with 4 dots per row, soft solid color outline, no fill.](https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/e63638fa-98e2-4833-99b5-4771b507e786_J3og8AcvG.png)

https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/e63638f.alt: A cartoon image of a rectangular array with 8 rows with 4 dots per row, soft solid color outline, no fill.

hints.content:
The array has $8$ rows with $4$ dots per row.

We can find the total number of dots by counting by $4$s.

![A cartoon image of the same array with the rows partially numbered by fours, soft solid color outline, no fill.](https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/60fece35-f8d6-44f5-80b8-5de4c4e64dce_GDWSBj99I.png)

https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/60fece3.alt: A cartoon image of the same array with the rows partially numbered by fours, soft solid color outline, no fill.

hints.content:
There are $\maroonD{32}$ total dots.

![A cartoon image of the same array with the rows numbered 4, 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 28, 32, soft solid color outline, no fill.](https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/914267a9-9a30-40eb-aac3-358514e827ae_Yhat4lFus.png)

https://ik.imagekit.io/20z1p1q07/914267a.alt: A cartoon image of the same array with the rows numbered 4, 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 28, 32, soft solid color outline, no fill.
